member.name: ID3D12DebugCommandList1.AssertResourceState
member.summary: Validates that the given state matches the state of the subresource, assuming the state of the given subresource is known during recording of a command list (e.g. the resource was transitioned earlier in the same command list recording). If the state is not yet known this method sets the known state for further validation later in the same command list recording.
member.param: The index of the subresource to check. This can be set to an index, or D3D12_RESOURCE_BARRIER_ALL_SUBRESOURCES.
Specifies the state to check for. This can be one or more flags Or'ed together.
member.returns: This method returns true if the tracked state of the resource or subresource matches the specified state, false otherwise.

member.name: ID3D12DebugCommandList1.GetDebugParameter
member.summary: Gets optional Command List Debug Layer settings.
member.param: Specifies a value that determines which debug parameter data to copy to the memory pointed to by pData.
Points to the memory that will be filled with a copy of the debug parameter data. The interpretation of this data depends on the given in the Type parameter.
Size in bytes of the memory buffer pointed to by pData.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, otherwise E_INVALIDARG.

member.name: ID3D12DebugCommandList1.SetDebugParameter
member.summary: Modifies optional Debug Layer settings of a command list.
member.param: Specifies a value that indicates which debug parameter data to set.
Pointer to debug parameter data to set. The interpretation of this data depends on the given in the Type parameter.
Specifies the size in bytes of the debug parameter pData.
member.returns: This method returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D12DebugCommandList1
